commands.command: create UNIQUE index AccessionNumber on Accessions (repositoryId,accessionNumber1,accessionNumber2,accessionNumber3,accessionNumber4)
create unique index uniqueResourceAccessionLink on AccessionsResources (resourceId, accessionId)
create unique index ResourceId on Resources (repositoryId,resourceIdentifier1,resourceIdentifier2,resourceIdentifier3,resourceIdentifier4)

create unique index UniqueLocations on LocationsTable (building,floor,room,area,coordinate1Label,coordinate1NumericIndicator,coordinate1AlphaNumIndicator, coordinate2Label,coordinate2NumericIndicator,coordinate2AlphaNumIndicator, coordinate3Label,coordinate3NumericIndicator,coordinate3AlphaNumIndicator,classificationNumber,barcode)
create unique index UniqueSubjects on Subjects (subjectTerm,subjectTermType,subjectSource)
create unique index uniqueDefaultValue on DefaultValues (repositoryId, fieldId)
